【40H Long Playtime and LED Display】The wi-fi earbuds can provide as much as 4 hours playtime on a single cost, charging case delivers greater than 40 hours of battery life. and you do not have to fret about sudden energy outage whereas touring.Bluetooth headphones use the distinctive LED show know-how to precisely show the remaining energy of earbuds and charging case.
【One-Step Pairing and Touch Control】Simply take the wi-fi headphones out of the charging case and they’ll mechanically connect with your cellphone ,By touching the Bluetooth earphones to reply the cellphone and hold up the cellphone, music play/pause, music up and down , quantity up/down, or entry to different features, the operation may be very easy and handy.
【Superior Stereo Sound Quality】The True Wireless Earbuds X15 mix clever design with breakthrough know-how and crystal clear stereo sound.Adopting full-range dynamic driver and after being earnestly tuned by acoustic engineers, X15 earphones can considerably cut back loss in sound high quality and restore the essence of sound.you possibly can ensure that you’ll hear the treble, really feel the bass, and actually lose your self in immersive sound.
【Ergonomic design and Waterproof IPX7】 Scan the ear canal information of 1000’s of individuals and get the very best ergonomic design. Lightweight, protected and comfy in-ear design suits your ear completely. It won’t rub, slip, or fall throughout train.Three sizes of sentimental, tapered silicone ideas for a customisable match.With IPX7 waterproof know-how nicely protects your headphones from sweat and rain throughout intense exercises or day by day use.
【Latest Bluetooth 5.0 Technology】The True Wireless Earphones makes use of the most recent Bluetooth 5.0 chipset. It supplies sooner and extra steady sign transmission and efficiently achieves low latency with out interruption. With a variety of as much as 15 toes, whether or not you’re at residence, within the workplace, or on the highway, you do not have to fret about disconnection.Automatic pairing & suitable with a number of units.
